name: part_007
file: tmp_【Mini 3D Live】hololive ID 3rd Generation h3ro Night Live #h3roNightLive [dQ_i_bGR3Zo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Kobo Kanaeru and Vestia Zeta perform the song 'Okochama Sensou'.
Post-performance dialogue where Kobo and Zeta talk about being hungry and wanting to eat meatballs.
Kobo transitions into a skit where she acts as a meatball (bakso) vendor.
Performance of the Indonesian children's song 'Abang Tukang Bakso'.

subtitles.original: おこちゃま戦争
subtitles.english: Childish War

subtitles.original: ハイ ハイ ハイ ハイ お兄様のおせのままに
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, yes, yes, as my brother commands.

subtitles.original: あーむかつくぜ！まーじむかつくぜ！
subtitles.english: Aah, it's annoying! It's so annoying!

subtitles.original: 兄に対してなまいきな態度
subtitles.english: Your cheeky attitude towards your brother!

subtitles.original: とき声上げろ どなり散らせ
subtitles.english: Raise a war cry, shout around!

subtitles.original: 喧嘩上等 バトル前哨戦 宣戦布告
subtitles.english: Ready for a fight! Battle skirmish! Declaration of war!

subtitles.original: いたずらして 悪乗りして
subtitles.english: Pranking around, getting carried away,

subtitles.original: ほらほら煽ってくスタイルで
subtitles.english: See, see? That's my provocative style.

subtitles.original: お安売り 買った奴ら
subtitles.english: Those who bought into the cheap sales,

subtitles.original: 毎度ありがとうで 君の負け！
subtitles.english: Thank you for your business every time, you lose!

subtitles.original: さあ、引き出しを煽れ
subtitles.english: Now, open up the drawers!

subtitles.original: 愛の駆け引きで決める
subtitles.english: Decide it with the tactics of love!

subtitles.original: 姉の威厳見せるため
subtitles.english: To show my dignity as your elder sister,

subtitles.original: 甘めの目言えばジリジリ
subtitles.english: When I speak with sweet eyes, you're on edge.

subtitles.original: 理想の目覚め 俺を誰だと思ってる
subtitles.english: Waking up to an ideal, who do you think I am?

subtitles.original: ささ、皆さまお手を拝借
subtitles.english: Come, everyone, lend me your hands.

subtitles.original: 当たり前だろ 余裕綽々
subtitles.english: It's obvious, right? I'm perfectly calm.

subtitles.original: 生まれながらにしてチート
subtitles.english: I've been a cheat since birth,

subtitles.original: 出来損ないの人生がスタート
subtitles.english: A failure's life has begun.

subtitles.original: 当然です 見てみな優勝は ガチ勢！
subtitles.english: Of course! Look, the winner is the try-hard!

subtitles.original: はい、はい、はい、はい、花丸よくできました！
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, yes, yes, a gold star! Well done!

subtitles.original: あーむかつくぜ！まーじむかつくぜ！
subtitles.english: Aah, it's annoying! It's so annoying!

subtitles.original: 僕にも勝てへら口なんざ
subtitles.english: Saying such cheeky things to me...

subtitles.original: とっておきを 君に見舞え
subtitles.english: I'll show you my best shot,

subtitles.original: 報復的いたい 挑発しちゃって
subtitles.english: Painful retaliation, provoking me like that.

subtitles.original: 意地悪して 一枚上
subtitles.english: Being mean, always one step ahead,

subtitles.original: チャンスはもらってくスタンスで
subtitles.english: I'll take every chance, that's my stance.

subtitles.original: 痛恨ミス！
subtitles.english: A critical mistake!

subtitles.original: あーあ、お生憎様だね 君の負け！
subtitles.english: Aah, how unfortunate for you, you lose!

subtitles.original: だけど君 君だけが
subtitles.english: But you, you're the only one...

subtitles.original: 僕に見合う ライバル
subtitles.english: A rival worthy of me.

subtitles.original: 落ちるのも 凹んでるのも
subtitles.english: Falling down, feeling depressed...

subtitles.original: 調子狂わされるから
subtitles.english: Because it throws me off my game,

subtitles.original: 今宵もテメーと
subtitles.english: Tonight, with you again...

subtitles.original: あーむかつくぜ！まーじむかつくぜ！
subtitles.english: Aah, it's annoying! It's so annoying!

subtitles.original: 憎まれ口は 叩き合うが
subtitles.english: We trade insults with each other,

subtitles.original: 時を放て 喉を鳴らせ
subtitles.english: Release time, let your voice ring out,

subtitles.original: 期待しないで待ってな
subtitles.english: Don't hold your breath, just wait.

subtitles.original: いたずらして 悪乗りして
subtitles.english: Pranking around, getting carried away,

subtitles.original: ほらほら煽ってくスタイルで
subtitles.english: See, see? That's my provocative style.

subtitles.original: 1から10 いただきます！
subtitles.english: I'll take it all, from one to ten!

subtitles.original: 毎度ありがとうで 君の負け！
subtitles.english: Thank you for your business every time, you lose!

subtitles.original: 引き分け？
subtitles.english: A tie?

subtitles.original: Wah, gila! Gila banget ya Zeta?
subtitles.english: Wow, crazy! So crazy, right Zeta?

subtitles.original: Gila sih, membahayakan kamu.
subtitles.english: It's crazy, you're endangering yourself.

subtitles.original: Wah kamu, wah kamu, aduh bahaya kamu.
subtitles.english: Whoa you, whoa you, boy you're dangerous.

subtitles.original: Oh gitu?
subtitles.english: Oh, really?

subtitles.original: Iya.
subtitles.english: Yes.

subtitles.original: Laper gak? Mau makan?
subtitles.english: Hungry? Want to eat?

subtitles.original: Mau, ayo.
subtitles.english: Yes, let's go.

subtitles.original: Ketik satu...
subtitles.english: Type one...

subtitles.original: Jika mau dibeliin Zeta makan bakso tapi ya.
subtitles.english: If you want Zeta to buy you meatballs, that is.

subtitles.original: Yang dibeliin Zeta atau kamu?
subtitles.english: Who's getting bought for, Zeta or you?

subtitles.original: Lah? Akulah!
subtitles.english: Huh? Me, of course!

subtitles.original: Gak mau, kamu beli sendiri!
subtitles.english: No way, buy it yourself!

subtitles.original: Ih, ya udah iya. Zeta mau juga gak? Ketik satu, ih, satu satu satu.
subtitles.english: Fine. Does Zeta want some too? Type one, geez, one one one.

subtitles.original: Gak usah ketik satu, ketik dua kalau Kobo harus traktir aku juga gantian.
subtitles.english: No need to type one, type two if Kobo has to treat me too in return.

subtitles.original: Enggak, itu udah pada ketik satu ketik satu, ayo ah!
subtitles.english: No, they're already typing one, typing one, let's go!

subtitles.original: Ya udah ketik dua.
subtitles.english: Fine, type two.

subtitles.original: Ya udah lah, ketik satu ih.
subtitles.english: Oh come on, type one.

subtitles.original: Aku juga laper, dah yuk makan bakso.
subtitles.english: I'm hungry too, let's go eat meatballs.

subtitles.original: Gak usah ketik-ketik, aku mau makan.
subtitles.english: No more typing, I want to eat.

subtitles.original: Bakso ya?
subtitles.english: Meatballs, right?

subtitles.original: Iya.
subtitles.english: Yes.

subtitles.original: Nih aku pijetin.
subtitles.english: Here, let me massage you.

subtitles.original: Bakso, bakso! Bakso!
subtitles.english: Meatballs, meatballs! Meatballs!

subtitles.original: Bakso! Halo!
subtitles.english: Meatballs! Hello!

subtitles.original: Sepi bener pembelinya nih.
subtitles.english: So quiet, no customers.

subtitles.original: Mesti pakai bahasa Inggris kali ya?
subtitles.english: Maybe I should use English?

subtitles.original: Meatball, meatball! Meatball bakso!
subtitles.english: Meatball, meatball! Meatball meatballs!

subtitles.original:
Abang Tukang Bakso
Lyrics Composition: Mamo Agil
subtitles.english:
Abang Tukang Bakso
Lyrics Composition: Mamo Agil

subtitles.original: Abang tukang bakso, mari mari sini, aku mau beli.
subtitles.english: Meatball man, come over here, I want to buy.

subtitles.original: Abang tukang bakso, cepat dong kemari, sudah tak tahan lagi.
subtitles.english: Meatball man, come here quickly, I can't take it anymore.

subtitles.original: Satu mangkok saja, lima ribu perak, yang banyak baksonya.
subtitles.english: Just one bowl, five thousand rupiah, with lots of meatballs.

subtitles.original: Tidak pakai saos, tidak pakai sambel, tapi minta pakai kol.
subtitles.english: No sauce, no chili sauce, but I want cabbage.

subtitles.original: Bakso bulat, seperti bola pingpong.
subtitles.english: Meatballs are round, like ping pong balls.

subtitles.original: Kalau lewat, membikin perut kosong.
subtitles.english: When they pass by, they make the stomach empty.

subtitles.original: Jadi anak, janganlah suka bohong.
subtitles.english: As a child, don't be a liar.

subtitles.original: Kalau bohong, digigit kambing ompong.
subtitles.english: If you lie, you'll be bitten by a toothless goat.

subtitles.original: Abang tukang bakso, mari mari sini, aku mau beli.
subtitles.english: Meatball man, come over here, I want to buy.

subtitles.original: Abang tukang bakso, cepat dong kemari, sudah tak tahan lagi.
subtitles.english: Meatball man, come here quickly, I can't take it anymore.
